layout.singingstanza: Thank You, Lord, You are mind -- ful of man; Thank You, Lord, You are mind -- ful of man. lyrics.stanza: I see Your heavens, Works of Your fingers: Moon, stars, You ordained, Yet still, You are mindful of man!
